description:
Chipmunk likes his nice fuzzy leaf which he sleeps with, but he needs a thinner blanket now that the weather is getting warmer. Bonobono suggests a nice thin leaf, but it`s too big for Chipmunk to carry. Chipmunk find a leaf-eating Gomoku bug and decides to follow it to the best leaves of all...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シマリスくんは虫がキライ
